text: One United States Navy ship has borne the name Pulaski, after Casimir Pulaski. Another ship has borne the name Casimir Pulaski. This ship is sometime incorrectly referred to as USS Pulaski. There was yet another USN ship which contained the word Pulaski. Named for Casimir Pulaski * * Named for place which was named to honor Casimir Pulaski * ==See also== * , a Polish Navy frigate * Pulaski (disambiguation) Category:United States Navy ship names
title: USS Pulaski
